steps.name: the user hovers over the "Your Account" icon
the user hovers over "Sign In" and clicks it
the user enters a mobile number in the "9346250755" field
clicks the "Continue" button
the user is redirected to the password entry page
enters the password in the "nagamani484@L#" field
clicks the "Sign In" button
the user should see "Welcome to Prime Video"

steps.name: the user hovers over the "Your Account" icon
the user hovers over "Sign In" and clicks it
the user enters a mobile number in the "123" field
clicks the "Continue" button
the user is redirected to the password entry page
enters the password in the "ValidPass123" field
clicks the "Sign In" button
the user should see "Invalid mobile number error shown"

steps.name: the user hovers over the "Your Account" icon
the user hovers over "Sign In" and clicks it
the user enters a mobile number in the "9876543210" field
clicks the "Continue" button
the user is redirected to the password entry page
enters the password in the "wrongpass" field
clicks the "Sign In" button
the user should see "Incorrect password error shown"

steps.name: the user hovers over the "Your Account" icon
the user hovers over "Sign In" and clicks it
the user enters a mobile number in the "" field
clicks the "Continue" button
the user is redirected to the password entry page
enters the password in the "ValidPass123" field
clicks the "Sign In" button
the user should see "Mobile number required error"

elements.name: Signup attempt with different mobile and password combinations

the user hovers over "Sign In" and clicks it
the user enters a mobile number in the "9876543210" field
clicks the "Continue" button
